name: The Hall of Mirrors
description: The Hall of Mirrors started as an extension of my other short game, The Book of Sands. It was my midterm project in Spring 2017.  I intended to build a metaphorical language out of symbols through which I could tell stories of different memories I have. The mechanics allow you to draw lines between different symbols in 3D space, with constraints on the number of lines being drawn from each symbol type.
